# @ciscospark/xunit-with-logs

[![standard-readme compliant](https://img.shields.io/badge/readme%20style-standard-brightgreen.svg?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/RichardLitt/standard-readme)

> Mocha reporter based on the core XUnit reporter; captures console output and includes it under the related test node.

- [Install](#install)
- [Usage](#usage)
- [Contribute](#contribute)
- [Maintainers](#maintainers)
- [License](#license)

## Install

```bash
npm install --save @ciscospark/xunit-with-logs
```

## Usage

```bash
mocha --reporter @ciscospark/xunit-with-logs ./tests
```

## Maintainers

This package is maintained by [Cisco Spark for Developers](https://developer.ciscospark.com/).

## Contribute

Pull requests welcome. Please see [CONTRIBUTING.md](../../CONTRIBUTING.md) for more details.
